body: Burning Flash (Fire), Disappear (Concealing), Energy Resistance (Body), Moderate Cure (Healing), Moderate Wound (Wounding), Paralyze Humanoid (Binding), Sense Alignment* (Detection), Sense Hidden (Detection), Sense Thoughts (Detection), Suppress (Dispelling)
